name: Adithya
tidbit: Loud and opinionated. Dont call before 8 am

conversations.note: Went on a walk with her. saw cute cats

name: Snoopa
tidbit: Dont crack a joke before sessions. she will crack your hand extra hard

conversations.note: During last session, she told me not to sleep on my back for too long. Told me she will show me her cute niece's photo at tomorrows session at 4 pm
He always wants money. He is currently 32 and is homeless lol
